thing-type.label: YRD216 Yale Real Living Assure Lock Push Button Deadbolt
thing-type.description: Yale Real Living Assure Lock Push Button Deadbolt<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtYale Assure Lock</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtPush Button keypad with backlit numbers that won’t wear off</li&gt <li&gtMechanical key override</li&gt <li&gtManage up to 25 unique codes to share with friends and family</li&gt <li&gtWeather Protection Gasket</li&gt <li&gtOne-touch locking and keypad wake-up</li&gt <li&gtPrivacy Mode – privacy button located on the interior side of the lock enables users to temporarily disable user codes</li&gt <li&gtTamper Resistant Battery Cover</li&gt <li&gtTamper Alert – audible alarm sounds if there is an attempt to forcibly remove the lock</li&gt <li&gtAutomatically relocks after 30 seconds</li&gt <li&gtSimple to install on standard doors and replaces your existing deadbolt in minutes with just a screwdriver</li&gt <li&gtCertified ANSI/BHMA A156.36, Grade 2</li&gt <li&gtLifetime limited warranty for finish and mechanical, one year electronics</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo join the lock in a Z-Wave Network (taken from the installation manual)</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtEnter the master pin and press #</li&gt <li&gtPress 7, then #</li&gt <li&gtPress 1, then #</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThe lock will now be in inclusion mode.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo exit the Z-Wave Network (taken from the installation manual)</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtEnter the master pin and press #</li&gt <li&gtPress 7, then #</li&gt <li&gtPress 3, then #</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThe lock will now be in exclusion mode.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Silent mode
parameter.description: Silent mode on/off<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefault is 1 or High Volume</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Auto Relock
parameter.description: Auto Relock on/off<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtdefault is 0x00 or OFF</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Auto Relock Time
parameter.description: Auto Relock Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt10 to 180 seconds (default is 30 seconds)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Wrong code Entry Limit
parameter.description: Wrong code Entry Limit<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt3 to 10 (default is 5 times)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Shut down time
parameter.description: Shut down time after wrong code entries<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt10 to 180 seconds (default is 60 seconds)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Operating mode
parameter.description: Operating mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt00 = normal mode (this is the default mode)<br /&gt01 = vacation mode, keypad lockout<br /&gt02 = privacy mode, no keypad. RF Unlock will work</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: Reset to factory default
parameter.description: Reset to factory default<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt01 = Lock will execute Reset To Factory.</p&gt</p&gt
